Gleamdance dagger was an enchanted dagger, created using a pair of pixie wings with the wings shimmering tracings visible day and night, shining the brightest in Sel√ªnes light.
Gleamdance daggers +2 enchantment guided the wielders hand towards the target and increased the blades damage, making it useful when wielding against creatures unaffected by non-magical weapons. The dagger always glowed when it was held in a persons hand, illuminating the area of  around it. When the dagger was wielded in ones off-hand, it magically increased the wielders defenses similarly to a +1 armor enchantment.
In the , a Gleamdance dagger was wielded by the shady gnome named Farlin, a thug member of the Guild of Baldurs Gate, during its conflict with the Stone Lords gang.
